movies.title: The King's Dementia
movies.plot: The king's dementia tells the story of how a director called King deals with his rejected script 'Teluki' and his self conflict and metaphorical internal war with society and his darkness.
movies.simplePlot: The king's dementia tells the story of how a director called King deals with his rejected script 'Teluki' and his self conflict and metaphorical internal war with society and his darkness.

biography.bio: Abdul Zainidi is an actor and writer, known for Teluki (2013), The King's Dementia (2013) and Bread Dream (2012).
biography.name: Abdul Zainidi
